summary.position: Post Doctoral Researcher in Human-Centered AI for Software Engineering
summary.department: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

responsibilities.primary: Engage in research applying Large Language Models to software project management.
responsibilities.collaboration: Work with a team of researchers from leading Danish universities and practitioners from software companies in Denmark and Sweden.

collaboration.project: AI4SE1DK - Human-Centered Adoption of Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering in Denmark

collaborators.details: Large industrial partner involved in the research.

eligibility.required_degree: PhD in Computer Science or related field
qualifications: Solid research experience in applied AI with Large Language Models
Main author of at least one high-impact journal publication
Experience publishing in journals and conferences
Ability to collaborate in a multidisciplinary team

summary.description: The position is focused on advancing the adoption of human-centered AI in software engineering, especially using Large Language Models.

submission_details.submission_process: Shortlisting is used. Candidates will be assessed by an expert committee.

program_highlights.research_infrastructure: Well-developed infrastructure and access to shared equipment.
program_highlights.interdisciplinary_environment: Collaboration with national, international, and industrial partners.

mandatory: Ph.D. in Computer Science or Software Engineering
candidate_requirements.optional: Prior research experience in industrial software development is a plus.

summary.equality_commitment: Aarhus University's commitment to fostering a culture of equality and diversity.
